'''''SEVEN 3''''' is the third volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in March [[1982]].<ref name="jstor" />
==Contents==
*"What Happened to Dorothy L. Sayers that Good Friday? "
**By: E.L. Mascall
*"The Emperor's Clothes Invisible? An Open Letter to Richard Webster"
**By: Kathleen Nott
*"The Dogma in the Manger (1954)"
**By: Dorothy L. Sayers
*"Notes Towards a Reply (1982)"
**By: Kathleen Nott
*"Meaning and ''The Mind of the Maker''"
**By: D.J. Taylor
*"George MacDonald and the World of Faery"
**By: Marion Lochhead
*"G.K. Chesterton and the Myth-Making Power"
**By: Leo A. Hetzler
*"Known in a Different Kind: A Comment on the Literary Criticism of Charles Williams"
**By: Brian Horne
*"The Dialectic of Multiple Worlds: An Analysis of C.S. Lewis's Narnia Stories"
**By: Michael Murrin
*"The Quality of Thinking: Owen Barfield as Literary Man and Anthroposophist"
**By: Patrick Grant<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/article_index|articlename=Contents By Volume|website=[https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/index VII: Journal of the Marion E. Wade Center]|accessed=13 August 2025}}</ref>
